note.p: Squatter in Australia. Brother of John Whitmore Isaac and Sophia, wife of Edward Holland. Emigrated to Australia in 1840; worked with his brother, Henry Edward Isaac (1816–62). Settler at Gowrie, Darling Downs, Queensland. In England, 1861. A member of the legislature of Queensland at his death.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/67/43/18, RG9/66/82/9)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 July 2022)
